text:
CurrencyFair | Backend and Frontend engineer | Dublin, Ireland | Visa/Relocation sponsorship | Remote is also a possibility

CurrencyFair is an online peer-to-peer currency exchange marketplace. We recently secured â‚¬20 million funding for our Asian expansion.

We need 1. Front-end engineers - ReactJS, CSS3 and HTML5. Experience with Wordpress is a plus. 2. Back-end engineers - Java and/or PHP.

Please see the detailed job description here. https://my.hirehive.io/currencyfair

Feel free to apply through the link or you can send me your directly at sprasanna at currencyfair dot com
